patch.job: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `k_cache` ( `cacheKey` varchar(255) collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `cacheTTL` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `cacheValue` longblob NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cacheKey`), KEY `cacheTTL` (`cacheTTL`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `k_i18n` ( `language` char(2) collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `key` varchar(255) collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `module` varchar(255) collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `flag` varchar(255) collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `value` mediumtext collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
